attributeList.name: circuit_layout_d4
attributeList.doc: Circuits layout consiting of CNOTs and RY gates defined as lists of operations and wires they act on with a circuit depth of 4.

attributeList.name: circuit_layout_d8
attributeList.doc: Circuits layout consiting of CNOTs and RY gates defined as lists of operations and wires they act on with a circuit depth of 8.

attributeList.name: params_d4
attributeList.doc: Circuit parameters as list of RY angles. When plugged in to the circuit layout with a depth of 8, the circuit approximates the flexible representation of quantum images (FRQI).

attributeList.name: params_d8
attributeList.doc: Circuit parameters as list of RY angles. When plugged in to the circuit layout with a depth of 8, the circuit approximates the flexible representation of quantum images (FRQI).

attributeList.name: exact_state
attributeList.doc: A list of numpy arrays. Each numpy array defines a quantum state that exactly encodes an Fashion-MNIST image.

attributeList.name: labels
attributeList.doc: A list of the correct labels for each image.
